name: proxyfront
description: Turn Cloudfront as dynamic forward proxy server

scripts.build: check-engine && rm -Rf dst && tsc && cd src && find . \( -name '*.json' -o -name '*.html' \) -type f -exec cp {} ../dst/{} \;  && cd ..
scripts.pack: rm -f dst.zip && cp package.json dst/package.json && (cp package-lock.json dst/ || true) && (cp .npmrc dst/.npmrc || true) && cd dst && npm install --cache=../.npm --production && npm ls --production && zip -rqy ../dst.zip . && cd ..
scripts.pretest: check-engine && rm -Rf dst && tsc -p ./tsconfig.test.json && cd src && find . -name '*.json' -type f -exec cp {} ../dst/{} \; && cd ..
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run pack && serverless deploy --verbose

author: MooYeol Prescott Lee <mooyoul@gmail.com>
